actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation Credit and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to establish a bid-back program for lands enrolled in the conservation reserve program.
short_title: Conservation Reserve Program Improvement Act of 1990

summary.text: Conservation Reserve Program Improvement Act of 1990 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to: (1) extend the conservation reserve program (CRP); and (2) authorize a bid-back program to remove the least highly erodible CRP land under specified circumstances.

titles.title: Conservation Reserve Program Improvement Act of 1990
To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to establish a bid-back program for lands enrolled in the conservation reserve program.
